#This page is intended for the Pre-Alpha 0.0.1 release

= Introduction =

This page provides a feature guide to the features available in various versions.
This page is intended for the Pre-Alpha 0.0.1 release


= Details =

For the Pre-Alpha release 0.0.1, the following features are only available:
  * *Create 'New Perl' files*
  * *Open existing Perl files*
  * *Save Perl file in editor*
  * *Check Syntax of the currently selected file in editor*
  * *Execute the selected file in editor*
